content: As you can see, Archiboos help your Neighbors take care of their Planettes... {A想到了}You can try gifting enough Archiboos to <style=Highlight>any one of your Neighbors</style>.
info: 阿奇宝_莫白介绍成长等级_主流程文本II

content: By helping them gain more vitality and live their best lives, you might even discover some more delightful surprises. Hoho!
